name: Search for laptops,add to cart and verify the total price -- @1.3
fullName: Amazon laptop purchase: Search for laptops,add to cart and verify the total price

steps.name: Given User is on the amazon website search for "acer laptops"
And add top "3" laptops to the cart
Then the total amount in the cart should match the laptop prices
